title: Enhancing the charge transport and luminescence properties of ethyl 4-[(E)-(2-hydroxy-4-methoxyphenyl)methyleneamino]benzoate through complexation: a DFT and TD-DFT study
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,18646-18662
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02250E, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Dinyuy Emmanuel Kiven, Fritzgerald Kogge Bine, Nyiang Kennet Nkungli, Aymard Dider Tamafo Fouegue, Stanley Numbonui Tasheh, Julius Numbonui Ghogomu
Organic light emitting diode (OLED) and organic solar cell (OSC) properties of ethyl 4-[(E)-(2-hydroxy-4-methoxyphenyl)methyleneamino]benzoate (EMAB) and its Pt2+, Pd2+, Ni2+, Ir3+, Rh3+, and Zn2+ complexes have been theoretically studied herein.
